PIC32CX-BZ Zigbee API Reference
Data Fields
ZDO_PowerDescResp_t Struct Reference

This command is generated by a remote device in response to a Power_Desc_req directed to the remote device. This command shall be unicast to the originator of the Power_Desc_req command. More...

#include <zdo.h>

Data Fields

ShortAddr_t nwkAddrOfInterest
 NWK address of the power descriptor request.
PowerDescriptor_t powerDescriptor
 Power descriptor of the device.

Detailed Description

This command is generated by a remote device in response to a Power_Desc_req directed to the remote device. This command shall be unicast to the originator of the Power_Desc_req command.
